title: Lights, Cameras, Action and the Drones of Turin
post: The Turin authorities designed and commissioned a new display cabinet for this exposition, which is what we see pictured in all the photos. It is different than the permanent reliquary in which the Shroud is usually stored.
author: Barrie Schwortz
